mapper.sql: id, tag_id, `path`, `method`, summary, meta_date, create_time, edit_time, creator, editor
mapper.select: select t1.project_id from tag_group t1 where t1.id = (select t2.tag_id from api_meta_date t2 where t2.id = #{id})
mapper.insert:

summary,
meta_date,

editor,

tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`path` = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

editor = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
